scope.description: Baseline engineering requirements library (superset) for condensers used in nuclear power plants (main steam surface condensers and auxiliary/shutdown condensers where applicable). Applicability is filtered by a CondenserProfile and project licensing basis.
scope.licensing_basis_assumption: US NRC-style framework (10 CFR Part 50/52) with code-of-record per 10 CFR 50.55a where applicable.
notes: This library is intentionally a superset. Not every requirement applies to every condenser configuration (surface, air-cooled, jet) or cooling system (once-through, cooling tower, hybrid).
Clause-level traceability (e.g., exact HEI/ASME/TEMA/NRC clause IDs) is expected to be added once the standards database is ingested and indexed.
Parameters and applicability conditions are designed for profile-driven filtering; projects may rename/normalize fields without changing schema.
